crew.name: Sy Snooties
crew.ability: When you complete a job, you may reduce the job's credit reward to [Credits]0 to gain 1 additional fame.

crew.name: Undercover Agent
crew.action: If a player in your space has more fame than you, discard this card to gain 1 fame and make that player lose 1 reputation of your choice.

mod.name: Chromium Hull
mod.ability:
When you gain fame, gain 1 additional fame. When you lose a ship combat, discard this card.
A player in your space can fight a ship combat against you as their encounter.

mod.name: Proton Torpedoes
mod.ability:
Gain +1 [Ship Combat Value].
When you win a combat against a patrol that has a fame reward, gain 1 additional fame.

gear.name: Extravagant Wardrobe
gear.ability:
While you have 2 or 3 [Positive] reputations, you have 1 additional fame.
While you have 4 [Positive] reputations, you have 2 additional fame.

gear.name: Mandalorian Armor
gear.ability: Gain +3 [Health]. When you gain the reward from a bounty, you may reduce the bounty's credit reward to [Credits]0 to gain 1 additional fame. Limit 1 ARMOR per character.

job.name: Attend Statue Dedication
job.description: Your biggest fans would like to erect a statue in your honor on their world. They have asked you to help fund the statue and to attend its dedication.
job.destination: Any planet where you have [Positive] reputation with the planet's faction.
job.reward: Gain 1 fame. You may spend [Credits]10,000 to gain 1 additional fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Legendary Game of Sabacc
job.description: Your skill at sabaac is well known throughout the galaxy, but another win could make you legendary. Especially if the odds are stacked against you.
job.encounter: Choose another player in your space, and you resolve card #40.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]10,000. If the active player claims this reward, they also gain 1 fame and discard this card.

cargo.name: Gift for Jabba
cargo.description:
Cannot buy on Tatooine.
When you become defeated, discard 1 of your crew.

cargo.name: Dejarik Holotable
cargo.description: While you have 2 or more crew, you have 1 additional fame.
cargo.action: If you are at a navpoint, roll 1 die for each crew you have. For each [Hit] or [Focus] result, gain [Credits]1,000.

cargo.name: Stolen Jewels
cargo.action: Choose another player in your space and discard this card. You both gain [Credits]7,000 and 1 fame.
